description.fr:
{Affinity:36}\_: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.36.avA} autour<sprite name="cell_around"> de votre héros.
\---
Piochez {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Affinity.36.draw} et {PAvalue:Affinity.36.pa} à son coût si {value:Affinity.36.target} adversaires sont touchés.
description.en:
{Affinity:36}: Does {magicalDamage:Affinity.36.avA} around<sprite name="cell_around"> your hero.
\---
Draw {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Affinity.36.draw} and {PAvalue:Affinity.36.pa} to the cost if {value:Affinity.36.target} opponents are hit.
description.es:
{Affinity:36}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.36.avA} alrededor<sprite name="cell_around"> de tu héroe.
\---
Sacas {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Affinity.36.draw} y {PAvalue:Affinity.36.pa} a su coste si {value:Affinity.36.target} adversarios son alcanzados.
description.de:
{Affinity:36}: Verursacht {magicalDamage:Affinity.36.avA} ringsum<sprite name="cell_around"> von deinem Helden.
\---
Zieht {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Affinity.36.draw} und {PAvalue:Affinity.36.pa} auf seine Kosten, wenn {value:Affinity.36.target}\_Gegner getroffen sind.
description.pt:
{Affinity:36}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.36.avA} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> do seu herói.
\---
Compre {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Affinity.36.draw} e {PAvalue:Affinity.36.pa} ao seu custo se {value:Affinity.36.target} adversários forem atingidos.

bgDescription.fr: Faites moi plaisir, vous êtes un héros... ou au moins un aventurier ! Alors laissez cette tasse de lait, ce n’est pas encore l’heure du goûter !
bgDescription.en: Go ahead and make my day. You're a hero… or an adventurer at least! Put down that glass of milk\_– it's not snack time yet!
bgDescription.es: Por favor, que eres {heroGender, m[un héroe] f[una heroína]} o, por lo menos, {heroGender, m[un aventurero] f[una aventurera]}: ¡suelta esa taza de leche! No es la hora de la merienda.
bgDescription.de: Also bitte, du bist ein Held ... oder zumindest ein Abenteurer! Darum lasse diese Tasse Milch stehen, noch ist nicht die Zeit für eine Zwischenmahlzeit!
bgDescription.pt: Faça-me me o favor, você é {heroGender, m[um herói] f[uma heroína]}… ou pelo menos {heroGender, m[um aventureiro] f[uma aventureira]}! Larga esse copo de leite, isso não é hora de ficar bebendo!
